## . [ github ](https://github.com/Wenj2)

#### Repository name

```
$ username.github.io
```

#### Description

``` 
$ hexo

```
$ check
```

## . [Hexo](https://hexo.io/zh-cn/)

#### 
```
$ npm install hexo-cli -g

$ hexo -v
```

#### 
```
$ hexo init myHexoBlog

$ cd myHexoBlog

$ git clone https://github.com/iissnan/hexo-theme-next.git themes/next //  next 
```
More info: [github](https://github.com/hexojs/hexo)

#### 
```
$ hexo s/server // 

$ hexo g/generate  // 

$ hexo d/deploy  //  gitbug

$ hexo clean // 
```

####  github SSH
```
$ cd ~/.ssh

$ vi id_rsa.pub  //  guthub SSH keys
```

####  github
```
$ cd public  // 

$ git remote add origin https://github.com/Wenj2/Wenj2.github.io.git  // 

$ git pull origin master --allow-unrelated-histories  // 

$ git push origin master
```

## . [Hexo ](https://hexo.io/zh-cn/docs/)

#####   _config.yml
```
$ theme: next  // 

$ language: zh-Hans  // 
```

```
$ footer:

$ menu  //

```

Post.title: curl
Post._content:
#### [](http://man.linuxde.net/curl)
#### 
```
$ curl [option] [url]
```
#### `-i`
```
//  protocol 
$ curl -i "http://www.mutool.cn"
```
#### `GET`
```
$ curl -i URL
```
#### `POST`
```
$ curl -d "id=1" URL
```
#### `PUT`
```
$ curl -T uploadfile URL

$ curl -i -H "Content-Type: application/json" -X POST -d '{"title":"Read a book"}' URL
```
#### `user-agent` 
```
$ curl -A "Mozilla/4.0 (compatible; MSIE 5.01; Windows NT 5.0)" URL
```
#### cookie
```
$ curl -b "id=1" URL
```
#### header
```
$ curl -H "Content-Type: application/json" URL
```
#### 
```
$ curl -u name:password URL
```
#### 
```
$ curl -x 123.178.2.103:80001 URL
```
#### 
```
// 
$ curl -O http:www.mutool.cn/index.html

// 
$ curl -o mutool.html http:www.mutool.cn/index.html

// 
$ curl -O http://www.linux.com/dodo[1-5].JPG

// 
$ curl -o #1_#2.JPG http://www.linux.com/{hello,bb}/dodo[1-5].JPG
// hello_dodo[1-5].JPG
```
#### 
```
$ curl -# URL
```
####  `referer`
```
$ curl -e "www.linux.com" URL
```

Post.title: supervisor
Post._content:
### 
Supervisor  Python  client/server  Linux/Unix 
 python 
#### [](http://supervisord.org/)
### 
; 
#### `alias`
```
alias proc='supervisorctl -c ~/bin/supervisord.conf'
```
#### `/bin/supervisord.conf`
```
[unix_http_server]
;file=/var/run/supervisor.node.sock
chmod=0700
file=/home/node/bin/supervisor.node.sock

[inet_http_server]         ; inet (TCP) server disabled by default

```

RuntimeError: maximum recursion depth exceeded in comparison

- 

##### 
```
def fact(n):
    return fact_iter(n, 1)

def fact_iter(num, product):
    if num == 1:
        return product
    return fact_iter(num - 1, num * product)
```
```
>>> fact(5)

===> fact_iter(5, 1)
===> fact_iter(4, 5)
===> fact_iter(3, 20)
===> fact_iter(2, 60)
===> fact_iter(1, 120)
===> 120
```

def fact(n):

    if num == 1:

    return fact_iter(num - 1, num * product)
